title: Command Execution
overview:
Windows-cpu is a CPU monitoring utility for windows.

The findLoad method passes a provided string directly to the shell, allowing arbitrary command execution. 

Proof of Concept:
This code will open the built-in calculator program.
```
var win = require('windows-cpu');
wind.findLoad('foo & calc.exe');
```
recommendation: Avoid passing user input to the findLoad method. If you must, pass user input through a sanitizer (such as a shell escaping tool) prior to passing it to findLoad.
